segments.text: Are you ready to order , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I have a fancy for some wine tonight . Can you recommend something for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our red wine is very famous . I'd suggest you try that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . What kind of red wine do you serve ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here are a variety of red wines for you to choose . You can have a taste then make your decision then . Here is the wine menu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The dry red wine looks quite good . I'd like to try this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then do you like any cheese to go with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? Do I have to order that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . But cheese is the best thing to go with red wine . And we have really fresh cheese which will be free if you order red wine . Here are the pictures . Pick out something you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really nice . I'd like this one . It looks very attractive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like for appetizer and dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Croissant for appetizer and two beef steaks for dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you want your steaks , rare , medium or well-done ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We'd like to have Black Forest Cake for dessert .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please wait for s while . We'll get it done quickly !
segments.speaker: S1
